name: A Padma Mandala
description:
"A Padma Mandala" - 2021

This moving mandala is an exploration of meditation movements, inspired by the layers of petals on a lotus flower and elements of nature. 

The ringing sound made by a Tibetan bowl gifted to me is a sound I often use in my meditations as I find the vibrations brings me focus. As for the sound of trickling water, it just always seems so peaceful. 

With this piece comes wishes of serenity, love, and acceptance. May you find your peace within.

I hope you enjoy watching and listening to this peace as much as I did while making it.
